name: Mr Darcy - Pride and Prejudice - 'Pride' women's tee
description:
CHARACTER: fitzwilliam darcy

BOOK: pride and prejudice

WHY YOU SHOULD GET IT: it's a truth universally acknowledged that a person in possession of a copy of pride and prejudice must be in want of a mr darcy tee

NOT HANDSOME ENOUGH TO TEMPT YOU?: just contact me if you have any special requirements (e.g. v-neck, scoop neck, sleeveless, cropped, coloured, with bells and whistles on, etc). Each is custom designed so I'm happy to make alterations on an individual basis.

Please note that these tees are a loose fit.



Here at he wore she wore you can find hand-made, reworked, customised and vintage clothes and accessories inspired by some of literature's most famous (or infamous) heroes, lovers and villains.

We've scoured the novels for references and spent hours scavenging in second-hand shops, vintage fairs and jumble sales to find the one-of-a-kind pieces that will recreate the styles of these iconic characters. Those clothes and accessories are listed on the he wore she wore ebay store

But for those of you who love Fitzwilliam Darcy but don't suit breeches, or admire Holden Caulfield but can't afford a suit and tie, we've these custom-made tote bags and tees. Each is customised so that you can wear your favourite characters and quotes wherever you go.

Follow the design process on the he wore she wore tumblr blog

I create all my own designs and make each individually using heat-transfer printing methods. If you have any queries about washing/ironing/general maintenance please don't hesitate to ask.
